document_data.name: ''Dagger of the Evil Eye''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Daggers of the Evil Eye''''' were magical weapons that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|43}}{{Cite dragon/179/Wonders of the Land of Fate}}
document_data.Description:
These weapons could be found in any dagger form including [[jambiya]]s, [[dirk]]s, [[stiletto]]s, etc.

Many other weapons in Zakhara could be cursed with the same effect, but daggers were by far the most common.
document_data.Powers: Using this weapon during combat cursed the wielder with the [[evil eye]]. This curse could be removed by a [[rawun]] or through the ''[[avert evil eye]]'' spell but would strike again if the wielder used the dagger again in combat.
